sqlMap.sql: SELECT B_H.ID FROM basedata.house B_H INNER JOIN house_interaction V_HI ON V_HI.houseid = B_H.id AND V_HI.status > 0 INNER JOIN admin.account V_A ON V_HI.agentid = V_A.id AND V_A.status = 1 WHERE B_H.status = 1 AND V_HI.StartDate <= now() AND V_HI.EndDate >= now()
sqlMap.select:
SELECT H.ID ID, H.Status AS Status, (H_S.TagList) AS Title, (H_R.TagList) AS RentTitle, RGN.CityID CityID, RGN.ParentID RegionID, RGN2.Name RegionName, RGN.RegionID PlateID, RGN.Name PlateName, RSD.ID ResidenceID, RSD.Name ResidenceName, RSD.Address Address, (SELECT group_concat(Cloudurl ORDER BY H_P.TYPE DESC, H_P.UpdateTime DESC SEPARATOR '12qwaszx,') FROM house_pic H_P WHERE H_P.HouseID = H.ID AND H_P.Type in (2,3) AND H_P.Status = 1 GROUP BY H.ID) PicURL, IF((SELECT count(1) FROM house_pic H_P WHERE H_P.ResidenceId = H.ResidenceId AND H_P.Type = 0 AND H_P.Status = 1 AND H_P.ShowStatus = 1) = 0, (SELECT group_concat(Cloudurl ORDER BY H_P.UpdateTime DESC SEPARATOR '12qwaszx,') FROM house_pic H_P WHERE H_P.Status = 1 AND H_P.ShowStatus = 1 AND H_P.ResidenceId = H.ResidenceId AND (H_P.Type = 0 OR H_P.Type = 1) GROUP BY H.ResidenceId), (SELECT group_concat(Cloudurl ORDER BY H_P.UpdateTime DESC SEPARATOR '12qwaszx,') FROM house_pic H_P WHERE H_P.Status = 1 AND H_P.ShowStatus = 1 AND H_P.ResidenceId = H.ResidenceId AND H_P.Type = 0 GROUP BY H.ResidenceId)) ResidencePicURL, H_S.Price AS SalePrice, 0 AS SaleAvg, H_R.Price RentPrice, H_R.EquipmentList Equipment, H.Decorating Decorating, H.PropertyArea Area, H.RoomType RoomType, H.Direction Direction, H.HouseType Type, CONCAT(RSD_B_C.FloorBegin, RSD_B_C.FloorEnd) Floor, H.Floor FloorLevel, H.BuildTime BuildDate, (H_S.SaleRec = 1) IsEmergent, (H_S.SaleRec = 2) IsRecommend, H.Memo HouseMemo, H.SourceType SourceType, H.ViewHouseType ViewHouseType, H.BuildingNo BuildingNo, H.CellNo CellNo, H.UpdateTime, A.ID AS BrokerID, A.Name AS BrokerName, A.ContactInfo1 AS BrokerMobile, 0 AS IsFollow, H.AddTime CreateTime, H_R.RentStatus RentStatus, (H_R.RentType = 2) CombinedRent, 0 AS FansCount, 0 AS AskedCount, (H_R.RentRec = 1) isEmergentRent, (H_R.RentRec = 2) isRecommendRent, false As isNew, H_R.DealTime DealTimeRent, H_R.Memo RentMemo, H_R.Price DealPriceRent, H_S.SaleStatus SaleStatus, false As isHot, H_S.DealTime DealTime, H_S.Price DealPrice, H_S.Memo Memo, IF(H.SourceType = 3, (SELECT AddTime FROM house_audit_history ah1 WHERE ah1.HouseID = H.ID AND ah1.Result = 1 AND ah1.Type = 1 ORDER BY AddTime DESC LIMIT 1) , (SELECT AddTime FROM house_audit_history ah1 WHERE ah1.HouseID = H.ID AND ah1.Result = 1 AND ah1.Type = 5 AND ah1.PostContent LIKE '%"saleStatus":1%' ORDER BY AddTime DESC LIMIT 1)) OnboardTime, H_S_B.BuildingInfo BuildingInfo, G_M.Lat AS Lat, G_M.Lng AS Lng, HC.Name ContactName, HC.Mobile ContactMobile, HC.Memo ContactMemo, HC.Committer ContactCommitter FROM house AS H LEFT JOIN residence AS RSD ON H.ResidenceID = RSD.ID LEFT JOIN region AS RGN ON RSD.RegionID = RGN.RegionID LEFT JOIN region AS RGN2 ON RGN.parentID = RGN2.regionID LEFT JOIN residence_building_cell AS RSD_B_C ON RSD_B_C.ID = H.CellID LEFT JOIN house_rent AS H_R ON H.ID = H_R.HouseID AND H_R.UpdateTime = (Select MAX(UpdateTime) From house_rent Where house_rent.houseid = H.ID) LEFT JOIN house_sale AS H_S ON H.ID = H_S.HouseID AND H_S.UpdateTime = (Select MAX(UpdateTime) From house_sale Where house_sale.houseid = H.ID) LEFT JOIN house_sold_building AS H_S_B ON H_S_B.HouseID = H.ID LEFT JOIN `mobile`.`google_map_place_base` AS G_M ON H.ResidenceID = G_M.ResidenceID AND G_M.IsMain = 1 LEFT JOIN basedata.house_contact HC ON HC.HouseID = H.ID AND HC.UpdateTime = (SELECT MAX(UpdateTime) FROM house_contact WHERE HouseID = H.ID) INNER JOIN house_interaction HI ON HI.houseid = H.id AND HI.status > 0 INNER JOIN admin.account A ON HI.agentid = A.id AND A.status = 1 WHERE H.Status = 1 AND RSD.zombie = 0 AND HI.StartDate <= now() AND HI.EndDate >= now()
H.ID >= #houseIdFrom#
H.ID < #houseIdTo#
H.ID IN ($houseIdsIn$)
H.ResidenceID = #residenceId#
H_S.SaleStatus = #saleStatus#
(H.LastTaskTime IS NULL OR H.UpdateTime >= H.LastTaskTime )

SELECT H.ID ID, H.Status AS Status, (H_S.TagList) AS Title, (H_R.TagList) AS RentTitle, RGN.CityID CityID, RGN.ParentID RegionID, RGN2.Name RegionName, RGN.RegionID PlateID, RGN.Name PlateName, RSD.ID ResidenceID, RSD.Name ResidenceName, RSD.Address Address, (SELECT group_concat(Cloudurl ORDER BY H_P.TYPE DESC, H_P.UpdateTime DESC SEPARATOR '12qwaszx,') FROM house_pic H_P WHERE H_P.HouseID = H.ID AND H_P.Type in (2,3) AND H_P.Status = 1 GROUP BY H.ID) PicURL, IF((SELECT count(1) FROM house_pic H_P WHERE H_P.ResidenceId = H.ResidenceId AND H_P.Type = 0 AND H_P.Status = 1 AND H_P.ShowStatus = 1) = 0, (SELECT group_concat(Cloudurl ORDER BY H_P.UpdateTime DESC SEPARATOR '12qwaszx,') FROM house_pic H_P WHERE H_P.Status = 1 AND H_P.ShowStatus = 1 AND H_P.ResidenceId = H.ResidenceId AND (H_P.Type = 0 OR H_P.Type = 1) GROUP BY H.ResidenceId), (SELECT group_concat(Cloudurl ORDER BY H_P.UpdateTime DESC SEPARATOR '12qwaszx,') FROM house_pic H_P WHERE H_P.Status = 1 AND H_P.ShowStatus = 1 AND H_P.ResidenceId = H.ResidenceId AND H_P.Type = 0 GROUP BY H.ResidenceId)) ResidencePicURL, H_S.Price AS SalePrice, 0 AS SaleAvg, H_R.Price RentPrice, H_R.EquipmentList Equipment, H.Decorating Decorating, H.PropertyArea Area, H.RoomType RoomType, H.Direction Direction, H.HouseType Type, CONCAT(RSD_B_C.FloorBegin, RSD_B_C.FloorEnd) Floor, H.Floor FloorLevel, H.BuildTime BuildDate, (H_S.SaleRec = 1) IsEmergent, (H_S.SaleRec = 2) IsRecommend, H.Memo HouseMemo, H.SourceType SourceType, H.ViewHouseType ViewHouseType, H.BuildingNo BuildingNo, H.CellNo CellNo, H.UpdateTime, -1 AS BrokerID, '' AS BrokerName, '' AS BrokerMobile, 0 AS IsFollow, H.AddTime CreateTime, H_R.RentStatus RentStatus, (H_R.RentType = 2) CombinedRent, 0 AS FansCount, 0 AS AskedCount, (H_R.RentRec = 1) isEmergentRent, (H_R.RentRec = 2) isRecommendRent, false As isNew, H_R.DealTime DealTimeRent, H_R.Memo RentMemo, H_R.Price DealPriceRent, H_S.SaleStatus SaleStatus, false As isHot, H_S.DealTime DealTime, H_S.Price DealPrice, H_S.Memo Memo, IF(H.SourceType = 3, (SELECT AddTime FROM house_audit_history ah1 WHERE ah1.HouseID = H.ID AND ah1.Result = 1 AND ah1.Type = 1 ORDER BY AddTime DESC LIMIT 1) , (SELECT AddTime FROM house_audit_history ah1 WHERE ah1.HouseID = H.ID AND ah1.Result = 1 AND ah1.Type = 5 AND ah1.PostContent LIKE '%"saleStatus":1%' ORDER BY AddTime DESC LIMIT 1)) OnboardTime, H_S_B.BuildingInfo BuildingInfo, G_M.Lat AS Lat, G_M.Lng AS Lng, HC.Name ContactName, HC.Mobile ContactMobile, HC.Memo ContactMemo, HC.Committer ContactCommitter FROM house AS H LEFT JOIN residence AS RSD ON H.ResidenceID = RSD.ID LEFT JOIN region AS RGN ON RSD.RegionID = RGN.RegionID LEFT JOIN region AS RGN2 ON RGN.parentID = RGN2.regionID LEFT JOIN residence_building_cell AS RSD_B_C ON RSD_B_C.ID = H.CellID LEFT JOIN house_rent AS H_R ON H.ID = H_R.HouseID AND H_R.UpdateTime = (Select MAX(UpdateTime) From house_rent Where house_rent.houseid = H.ID) LEFT JOIN house_sale AS H_S ON H.ID = H_S.HouseID AND H_S.UpdateTime = (Select MAX(UpdateTime) From house_sale Where house_sale.houseid = H.ID) LEFT JOIN house_sold_building AS H_S_B ON H_S_B.HouseID = H.ID LEFT JOIN `mobile`.`google_map_place_base` AS G_M ON H.ResidenceID = G_M.ResidenceID AND G_M.IsMain = 1 LEFT JOIN basedata.house_contact HC ON HC.HouseID = H.ID AND HC.UpdateTime = (SELECT MAX(UpdateTime) FROM house_contact WHERE HouseID = H.ID) WHERE H.Status <> 0 AND RSD.zombie = 0
H.ID >= #houseIdFrom#
H.ID < #houseIdTo#
H.ID IN ($houseIdsIn$)
H.ResidenceID = #residenceId#
H_S.SaleStatus = #saleStatus#
(H.LastTaskTime IS NULL OR H.UpdateTime >= H.LastTaskTime )
AND H.ID NOT IN ()

SELECT H.ID ID, H.Status AS Status, (H_S.TagList) AS Title, (H_R.TagList) AS RentTitle, RGN.CityID CityID, RGN.ParentID RegionID, RGN2.Name RegionName, RGN.RegionID PlateID, RGN.Name PlateName, RSD.ID ResidenceID, RSD.Name ResidenceName, RSD.Address Address, (SELECT group_concat(Cloudurl ORDER BY H_P.TYPE DESC, H_P.UpdateTime DESC SEPARATOR '12qwaszx,') FROM house_pic H_P WHERE H_P.HouseID = H.ID AND H_P.Type in (2,3) AND H_P.Status = 1 GROUP BY H.ID) PicURL, IF((SELECT count(1) FROM house_pic H_P WHERE H_P.ResidenceId = H.ResidenceId AND H_P.Type = 0 AND H_P.Status = 1 AND H_P.ShowStatus = 1) = 0, (SELECT group_concat(Cloudurl ORDER BY H_P.UpdateTime DESC SEPARATOR '12qwaszx,') FROM house_pic H_P WHERE H_P.Status = 1 AND H_P.ShowStatus = 1 AND H_P.ResidenceId = H.ResidenceId AND (H_P.Type = 0 OR H_P.Type = 1) GROUP BY H.ResidenceId), (SELECT group_concat(Cloudurl ORDER BY H_P.UpdateTime DESC SEPARATOR '12qwaszx,') FROM house_pic H_P WHERE H_P.Status = 1 AND H_P.ShowStatus = 1 AND H_P.ResidenceId = H.ResidenceId AND H_P.Type = 0 GROUP BY H.ResidenceId)) ResidencePicURL, H_S.Price AS SalePrice, 0 AS SaleAvg, H_R.Price RentPrice, H_R.EquipmentList Equipment, H.Decorating Decorating, H.PropertyArea Area, H.RoomType RoomType, H.Direction Direction, H.HouseType Type, CONCAT(RSD_B_C.FloorBegin, RSD_B_C.FloorEnd) Floor, H.Floor FloorLevel, H.BuildTime BuildDate, (H_S.SaleRec = 1) IsEmergent, (H_S.SaleRec = 2) IsRecommend, H.Memo HouseMemo, H.SourceType SourceType, H.ViewHouseType ViewHouseType, H.BuildingNo BuildingNo, H.CellNo CellNo, H.UpdateTime, A.ID AS BrokerID, A.Name AS BrokerName, A.ContactInfo1 AS BrokerMobile, 0 AS IsFollow, H.AddTime CreateTime, H_R.RentStatus RentStatus, (H_R.RentType = 2) CombinedRent, 0 AS FansCount, 0 AS AskedCount, (H_R.RentRec = 1) isEmergentRent, (H_R.RentRec = 2) isRecommendRent, false As isNew, H_R.DealTime DealTimeRent, H_R.Memo RentMemo, H_R.Price DealPriceRent, H_S.SaleStatus SaleStatus, false As isHot, H_S.DealTime DealTime, H_S.Price DealPrice, H_S.Memo Memo, IF(H.SourceType = 3, (SELECT AddTime FROM house_audit_history ah1 WHERE ah1.HouseID = H.ID AND ah1.Result = 1 AND ah1.Type = 1 ORDER BY AddTime DESC LIMIT 1) , (SELECT AddTime FROM house_audit_history ah1 WHERE ah1.HouseID = H.ID AND ah1.Result = 1 AND ah1.Type = 5 AND ah1.PostContent LIKE '%"saleStatus":1%' ORDER BY AddTime DESC LIMIT 1)) OnboardTime, H_S_B.BuildingInfo BuildingInfo, G_M.Lat AS Lat, G_M.Lng AS Lng, HC.Name ContactName, HC.Mobile ContactMobile, HC.Memo ContactMemo, HC.Committer ContactCommitter FROM house AS H LEFT JOIN residence AS RSD ON H.ResidenceID = RSD.ID LEFT JOIN region AS RGN ON RSD.RegionID = RGN.RegionID LEFT JOIN region AS RGN2 ON RGN.parentID = RGN2.regionID LEFT JOIN residence_building_cell AS RSD_B_C ON RSD_B_C.ID = H.CellID LEFT JOIN house_rent AS H_R ON H.ID = H_R.HouseID AND H_R.UpdateTime = (Select MAX(UpdateTime) From house_rent Where house_rent.houseid = H.ID) LEFT JOIN house_sale AS H_S ON H.ID = H_S.HouseID AND H_S.UpdateTime = (Select MAX(UpdateTime) From house_sale Where house_sale.houseid = H.ID) LEFT JOIN house_sold_building AS H_S_B ON H_S_B.HouseID = H.ID LEFT JOIN `mobile`.`google_map_place_base` AS G_M ON H.ResidenceID = G_M.ResidenceID AND G_M.IsMain = 1 LEFT JOIN basedata.house_contact HC ON HC.HouseID = H.ID AND HC.UpdateTime = (SELECT MAX(UpdateTime) FROM house_contact WHERE HouseID = H.ID) INNER JOIN house_interaction HI ON HI.houseid = H.id AND HI.status > 0 INNER JOIN admin.account A ON HI.agentid = A.id AND A.status = 1 WHERE H.Status <> 0 AND RSD.zombie = 0
H.ID >= #houseIdFrom#
H.ID < #houseIdTo#
H.ID IN ($houseIdsIn$)
H.ResidenceID = #residenceId#
H_S.SaleStatus = #saleStatus#
(H.LastTaskTime IS NULL OR H.UpdateTime >= H.LastTaskTime )
H.Status = #status#
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT H.ID) FROM house AS H LEFT JOIN house_rent AS R ON H.ID = R.HouseID LEFT JOIN house_sale AS S ON H.ID = S.HouseID LEFT JOIN house_audit_history AS HAH ON HAH.HouseID = H.ID

SELECT H.ID, H.Status, H.ResidenceID, H.PropertyArea, H.RoomType, H.AddTime, H.UpdateTime, H.Creator, H.LastUpdater, H.SourceType, H.BuildingNo, H.CellNo, H.DetailName, H.RoomType, R.Price rentPrice, R.RentStatus, S.Price salePrice, S.SaleStatus, RES.Name AS residenceName, REG.Name AS plateName, REG.CityID, RGN2.Name AS regionName, REG.CityID, HAH.UpdateTime AS onboardTime, HAH.AddTime AS applyTime, HAH.Comments AS auditComments, (SELECT HP.CloudURL FROM house_pic HP WHERE HP.HouseID = H.ID AND HP.Type in (2,3) AND HP.Status = 1 ORDER BY HP.TYPE DESC, HP.UpdateTime DESC LIMIT 0, 1) AS picURL, H.PropertyArea area, floor(S.Price/H.PropertyArea) avg FROM house AS H LEFT JOIN house_rent AS R ON H.ID = R.HouseID LEFT JOIN house_sale AS S ON H.ID = S.HouseID LEFT JOIN residence AS RES ON H.ResidenceID = RES.ID LEFT JOIN region AS REG ON REG.RegionID = RES.RegionID LEFT JOIN region AS RGN2 ON RGN2.RegionID = REG.parentID
LEFT JOIN house_audit_history AS HAH ON HAH.HouseID = H.ID AND HAH.AddTime = ( SELECT MAX(AddTime) FROM house_audit_history WHERE HouseID = H.ID AND Type = #auditType# )
LEFT JOIN house_audit_history AS HAH ON HAH.HouseID = H.ID
GROUP BY H.ID
SELECT *, 0 AS RentPrice, 0 AS RentStatus, 0 AS SalePrice, 0 AS SaleStatus, '' AS ResidenceName, '' AS RegionName, 0 AS CityID, '' AS PicURL FROM house WHERE ID = #id#
sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO house ( Status, ResidenceID, Direction, PropertyArea, OccupiedArea, BuildTime, HouseType, RoomType, Decorating, Floor, Memo, AddTime, UpdateTime, Creator, SourceType, BuildingNo, CellNo, DetailName, ClientType ) VALUES ( #status#, #residenceId#, #direction#, #propertyArea#, #occupiedArea#, #buildDate#, #houseType#, #roomType#, #decorating#, #floor#, #memo#, NOW(), NOW(), #creator#, #sourceType#, #buildingNo#, #cellNo#, #detailName#, #clientType#);
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS id
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE house SET UpdateTime = NOW()
Status = #status#
ResidenceID = #residenceId#
Direction = #direction#
PropertyArea = #propertyArea#
OccupiedArea = #occupiedArea#
BuildTime = #buildDate#
HouseType = #houseType#
RoomType = #roomType#
Decorating = #decorating#
Floor = #floor#
Memo = #memo#
SourceType = #sourceType#
BuildingNo = #buildingNo#
CellNo = #cellNo#
DetailName = #detailName#
WHERE ID = #id#
UPDATE basedata.house SET LastTaskTime = #lastTaskTime# WHERE ID >= #houseIdFrom# AND ID < #houseIdTo#
sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM house_sale WHERE HouseID = #id# LIMIT 0, 1
sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO house_sale ( HouseID, TagList, Price, SaleStatus, Source, AddTime, UpdateTime) VALUES ( #id#, #tagList#, #priceValue#, #saleStatus#, #source#, NOW(), NOW());
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS id
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE house_sale SET UpdateTime = NOW()
TagList = #tagList#
Price = #priceValue#
SaleStatus = #saleStatus#
WHERE HouseID = #id#
sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM house_rent WHERE HouseID = #id# LIMIT 0, 1
sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO house_rent ( HouseID, TagList, EquipmentList, DealTime, Price, RentStatus, AddTime, UpdateTime) VALUES ( #id#, #tagList#, #equipmentList#, #dealTime#, #priceValue#, #rentStatus#, NOW(), NOW());
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS id
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE house_rent SET UpdateTime = NOW()
TagList = #tagList#
EquipmentList = #equipmentList#
DealTime = #dealTime#
Price = #priceValue#
RentStatus = #rentStatus#
WHERE HouseID = #id#
